parse.title: List of political entities in the 35th century BC

text.*:
See also: List of state leaders in the 4th and 3rd millennia BC
List of Copper Age political entities – Political entities in the 21st century BC – Political entities by century

This is a list of political entities in the 35th century BC (3500–3401 BC).

States[edit]

State Year Started Year Ended
Assur 3500 BC 1800 BC
Bad-tibira 5000 BC 2300 BC
Eridu 5400 BC 600 BC
Isin 3500 BC 2100 BC
Jericho - Ancient 9000 BC 1573 BC
Kish 4000 BC 2300 BC
Lagash 4000 BC 2250 BC
Lower Egypt - Predynastic 9000 BC 3200 BC
Mari 5000 BC 1759 BC
Girsu 5000 BC 2100 BC
Nippur 5000 BC 2450 BC
Susa 4200 BC 2330 BC
Upper Egypt - Predynastic 4500 BC 3200 BC
Ur 4000 BC 2000 BC
Uruk 4000 BC 3100 BC

See also[edit]

  • List of Bronze Age states
  • List of Iron Age states
  • List of Classical Age states
  • List of states during Late Antiquity
  • List of states during the Middle Ages
